sections.title: Overview
sections.content: This guide covers setting up CTRE Phoenix 6 for Talon FX, CANcoder, and Pigeon 2.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
1. VS Code: Command Palette → "WPILib: Manage Vendor Libraries" → "Install new (online)".
2. URL: https://maven.ctr-electronics.com/phoenix6/latest/Phoenix6-latest.json

sections.title: Phoenix Tuner X
sections.content: Download Phoenix Tuner X to configure CAN IDs, update firmware, and license devices. All devices must have unique CAN IDs.
